title: If I say the 3 Quls after Fajr & Maghrib prayers, does it suffice for Morning & Evening Athkaar
transcript: finally in fajr prayer after we finish there are some pre some car that are shared between the after fajr prayer and the athkar of the morning such as ayatul kursi once here once here can we combine and just recite once for both yes such as after fajr once after fajr prayer once in the morning at car three each so if i read it three each would that suffice for the once after fajr prayer yes and so on you
